pinyin: zhè shì nǐ péngyǒu de chē ma?

allWords.English: is, is, are, am, yes, to be, variant of 是
your, you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您

's, of, ~'s (possessive particle), (used after an attribute), (used to form a nominal expression), (used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis), also pr., see 的士, really and truly, aim, clear
car, surname Che, car, vehicle, CL:輛|辆, war chariot (archaic), rook (in Chinese chess), rook (in chess)
?, see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine, (question particle for "yes-no" questions)
open, to open, to show (a ticket), to turn on, to switch on
book, abbr. for 書經|书经, book, letter, document, CL:本
There is, to have, there is, there are, to exist, to be
